word_mean: 肥皂，皂：脂肪酸或其等价物与碱的化合物，是清洁剂，且多用于搽剂、灌肠剂和片剂的制造。肥皂也是轻泻剂、解酸剂和防腐剂

lj.lj_ly: They needed a writer with some enthusiasm. No soap.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English sāpe, of West Germanic origin; related to Dutch zeep and German Seife. The verb dates from the mid 16th cent

entry.def: Soap is a substance that you use with water for washing yourself or sometimes for washing clothes.

entry.tran: 用肥皂擦洗;往…上面抹肥皂
entry.def: If you soap yourself, you rub soap on your body in order to wash yourself.
A soap is the same as a soap opera .

means.word_mean: 1. a cleansing agent made from the salts of vegetable or animal fats
1. rub soap all over, usually with the purpose of cleaning

example.en: Robert wanted to go, but we told him no soap.
example.zh: 罗伯特要想去,但我们对他说不行。

example.en: He wanted to get his money back，but it was no soap.
example.zh: 他想把钱要回来，可是没成功。

list.explanation: 肥皂剧(指一种以家庭的悲欢离合为题材的广播或电视连续剧)

example.en: This is a new soap opera which threatens to outmisery all the others.
example.zh: 这是一部新连续剧，其悲苦的情大有压倒一切之势。

list.explanation: 生活或生活片段与肥皂剧情节相似者或相类似的事件

example.en: Do you want to hear the latest in my never-ending soap opera?
example.zh: 你要不要听我说说我这没完没了与连续剧相似的生活中最近发生了什么？

list.explanation: 奉承话，好听话，甜言蜜语

example.en: Don't waste my time with soft soap. I know you don't mean it.
example.zh: 别叫甜言蜜语来浪费我的时间。我知道你口是心非。
